code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{Autocomplete}from"@react-google-maps/api";import{Toolbar,Box,AppBar,Typography,InputBase}from"@material-ui/core";import SearchIcon from"@material-ui/icons/Search";import useStyles from"./styles.js";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Header(_ref){let{setCoordinates}=_ref;const classes=useStyles();const[autocomplete,setAutocomplete]=useState(null);const onLoad=autoC=>setAutocomplete(autoC);const onPlaceChanged=()=>{const lat=autocomplete.getPlace().geometry.location.lat();const lng=autocomplete.getPlace().geometry.location.lng();setCoordinates({lat,lng});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppBar,{position:"static",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Toolbar,{className:classes.toolbar,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h5",className:classes.title,children:"Travel Advisor"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{display:"flex",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",className:classes.title,children:"Explore new places"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Autocomplete,{onLoad:onLoad,onPlaceChanged:onPlaceChanged,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:classes.search,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:classes.searchIcon,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SearchIcon,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InputBase,{placeholder:"Search...",classes:{root:classes.inputRoot,input:classes.inputInput}})]})})]})]})});}export default Header;
